Initializer# init(_:onCompletion:)

PassKitSwiftUIiOS 16.0+iPadOS 16.0+Mac CatalystvisionOS

```
nonisolated
init(
    _ passes: [PKPass],
    onCompletion: @escaping (Bool) -> Void
)
```

Available when `Fallback` is `EmptyView`.## [See Also](/documentation/PassKit/AddPassToWalletButton/init(_:onCompletion:)-1inhj#see-also)
